nodes.text: Penladen Hills was an area on the planet Naboo, reachable up the Solleu River from the capital city of Theed. It was the site of the Penladen detention camp during the 32 BBY Invasion of Naboo.

Jason Fry, writer of The Essential Guide to Warfare, eventually cut any mentioning of Penladen Hills in the final product. The hills were later made canonical in the StarWars.com blog post Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare: Author's Cut, Part 6 — Showdown at Naboo.
